content.query:
SELECT * FROM logdata_parquet;

CREATE TABLE logdata_parquet
(
    Correlationid varchar(300),
    Operationname varchar(300),
    Status varchar(200),
    Eventcategory varchar(300),
    [Level] varchar(200),
    [Time] datetime,
    Subscription varchar(200),
    Eventinitiatedby varchar (300),
    Resourcetype varchar (200),
    Resourcegroup varchar(100),
    Resource varchar(300)
);
